Title: Authorizes a real property tax exemption for certain eligible reservists
Summary: Authorizes a real property tax exemption for certain eligible reservists upon adoption of a local law, ordinance or resolution providing therefor; requires property of such eligible reservists to be the primary residence; requires such reservist must have retained active duty status for at least 90 consecutive days to claim such tax exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to tax exemptions for certain eligible reservists
